Key Match Events: The Dallas Mavericks snapped a four-game losing streak with a 110-93 victory over the San Antonio Spurs
Pre-Game Insights: Luka Doncic was a game-time decision due to not being 100% healthy
Post-Match Reflections: Doncic admitted to not being 100% healthy after the game, stating he feels 'a little bit less' physically right
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mavericks are now 6-7 in their first 13 games and 10th seed in the Western Conference
The team's struggles have come on the road, as they are 5-3 in their first eight games in Dallas
Others: Luka Doncic will miss Sunday's game against the Oklahoma City Thunder due to his current status
